meta_description.title: Advance Wars - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Advance Wars is a turn-based strategy video game developed for the Game Boy Advance by Intelligent Systems and published by Nintendo.Mode(s): Single-player, ‎multiplayer‎Publisher(s): NintendoComposer(s): Taishi SendaProducer(s): Takehiro Izushi‎Gameplay · ‎Battle system · ‎Plot · ‎Development

meta_description.title: Advance Wars (game)
meta_description.text: Advance Wars, known as Game Boy Wars Advance 1 in Japan, is a turn-based strategy game and the first game in the Advance Wars series released outside Japan.Release date: September 10, 2001 (NA); 2001 ...Developer: Intelligent Systems

people_also_ask.question: Will there be a new Advance Wars?
people_also_ask.heading: Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp apparently has a new release date now after it was recently delayed to 2022. According to the Nintendo Switch's eShop storefront, the game will now be releasing on April 8, 2022.30-Oct-2021
people_also_ask.title: Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp Release Date Leaked

people_also_ask.question: What is Advance Wars called in Japan?
people_also_ask.heading: Game Boy Wars Advance 1
people_also_ask.heading2: Advance Wars, known as Game Boy Wars Advance 1 in Japan, is a turn-based strategy game and the first game in the Advance Wars series released outside Japan.Advance Wars, known as Game Boy Wars Advance 1 in Japan, is a turn-based strategy gameturn-based strategy gameA turn-based strategy (TBS) game is a strategy game (usually some type of wargame, especially a strategic-level wargame) where players take turns when playing. This is distinguished from real-time strategy (RTS), in which all players play simultaneously.https://en.wikipedia.org › wiki › Turn-based_strategyTurn-based strategy - Wikipedia and the first game in the Advance Wars series released outside Japan.
people_also_ask.title: Advance Wars (game)

people_also_ask.question: How many Advance Wars are there?
people_also_ask.heading: To date there are four games in the series released in the Western Hemisphere: Advance Wars, Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising, Advance Wars: Dual Strike and Advance Wars: Days of Ruin/Dark Conflict.To date there are four games in the series released in the Western Hemisphere: Advance Wars, Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising, Advance Wars: Dual StrikeAdvance Wars: Dual StrikeDual Strike is an attack skill. It attacks an enemy with both weapons with increased critical strike chance, and can only be used while dual wielding. It has more damage and critical strike chance against enemies at full life.https://pathofexile.fandom.com › wiki › Dual_StrikeDual Strike - Official Path of Exile Wiki and Advance Wars: Days of Ruin/Dark Conflict.
people_also_ask.title: Advance Wars (series)

attributes.value: single-player video game, multiplayer video game

knowledge_panel.description: advance wars is a turn-based strategy video game developed for the game boy advance by intelligent systems and published by nintendo. it was released in north america on september 10, 2001. the game's release in japan and europe was delayed, supposedly due to the september 11 attacks in the united states. wikipedia
